name: Voltaic Decay
description:
* Radio crackling *

...

Davis? Do you receive me? Praise be to God, I thought something had happened to you... We lost so many men... You find yourself alone now.
The virus has evolved. This blue light... Stay away from it, others have tried to approach it before you. This thing enters your body and absorbs all your vital energy. If unfortunately, it touches you, you will become a lackey like those poor men who prowl the building... They are looking for you.
Flee, quickly. But beware, they just have to touch you one time to own you.
And if If they catch you, we can't do anything for you. Good luck, Davis.

* End of transmission *


ZQSD - Move
F - Interact
AE - Observe
CTRL - Crouch
Left Click - Shoot
R - Reload
ALT+F4 - Quit

- 3D ARTISTS -
Francesc Loyo Valls
Dana Al Ayash
Yvann Yidika Mona
Do Khac Quy Dang Vu
- ANIMATOR -
Alexandre Ladouce
- PROGRAMMER -
Lucas Monnet
